short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspire each session with the the galaxies finest!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cosmica extension displays beautiful imagery galaxies on a new tab.

Once you install it, you will see beautiful Chrome tab with cosmic images that are just mesmerising to your eyes which can inspire your imagination.

Features:
 ★ Clean tab layout
 ★ Beautiful cosmic images
 ★ Convenient search box
 ★ Quick links to social media platforms
 ★ Current local time

By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to installing the Cosmica Chrome™ extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab, homepage takeover, and search to that provided by the service with results by Microsoft Bing, and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Terms of Use: https://cosmica-tab.com/terms-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://cosmica-tab.com/privacy-policy/
